strapiPost.title: NASA Selects Bentonville Company To Aid Space Exploration Mission
strapiPost.content:
NASA has partnered with a Bentonville company to help make the first human lunar landing in more than 50 years. 

  • To the moon: Nasa selected Canoo, a local high-tech advanced mobility company, through a competitive process to provide Crew Transportation Vehicles (CTVs) for crewed Artemis lunar exploration. Canoo will manufacture custom all-electric vehicles in the heartland and deliver them to NASA by June 2023.
  • Fit for space: The CTVs will comfortably, safely, and functionally carry fully suited astronauts and flight support staff with their equipment to the launch site. The vehicles will be based on Canooâ€™s current LV model and adjusted to perfectly meet the needs of a space mission. 

Click HERE for more information.
